ue5

Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • ue5.Animal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMovable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Pet, WildAnimal

    public abstract class Animal
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMovable
    The abstract class Animal provides basic features for an animal.
    Author:
    Michael Kinzkofer, Paul Jureschek
